name: Kitsune Spell Mysteries
prereq: At Least One Innate Spell From A Kitsune Heritage Or Ancestry Feat
description:
You know more kitsune magic. During your daily preparations, choose bane, illusory object, or sanctuary. You can cast this as a 1st-level divine innate spell once that day.Kitsune Spell Mysteries Leads To...

Kitsune Spell ExpertiseTraitsKitsune: Shapeshifting humanoids whose true forms resemble foxes.
